item.title: Barclays upgrades Ferrari, sees attractive entry point after recent pullback
item.description: Ferrari has demonstrated its ability to remain resilient in the face of President Donald Trump's latest auto tariffs, Barclays said.

item.title: Jefferies upgrades this chip stock due to low China exposure compared to peers
item.description: The bank upgraded the semiconductor manufacturer to buy from hold.

item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Stocks slid for a second session on Thursday, coming under pressure after President Trump announced new auto tariffs. Here's what's on CNBC's radar Fr...

item.title: These three stocks are beating Nvidia and have room to run, Victoria Greene says
item.description: The chief investment officer of G Squared Private Wealth joined CNBC's "Power Lunch" on Thursday and discussed three stocks.

item.title: Wall Street analysts say Elon Musk is the clear auto tariff winner: 'Tesla wins, Detroit bleeds'
item.description: Several Wall Street analysts see Tesla as benefiting from Trump's plan for levies on cars.
